website_summaries.verdict: This is a creatively designed lint roller model that retracts and is refillable in order to reduce the chances of it sticking to other items.
pros: Roller part conveniently retracts to stop from sticking to other items, making it easy to stick this in a drawer or bag
Compact design makes it perfect for “on the go” use
Roller paper is sticky enough to reliably remove debris

customer_reviews.title: The locking mechanism is real weak y’all
customer_reviews.text: It’s small, easy to use, and is great to throw in my backpack or suitcase. I have 2 issues: 1) I wish there were more sheets per roll 2) My biggest complaint - the knob that you turn to open/close the roller doesn’t click into place and stay closed. It very easily spins itself open so I have to keep it in a tight space in my bag so it doesn’t just twirl around in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: It works, but not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The roller paper itself works well, however the housing / case leaves something to be desired. The cap on mine just spins and the roller wouldn't pop out. If I shake it, it pops out and I can use it as expected then push it back in. The whole point in buying a "retractable" roller was the case, and there it fails.
customer_reviews.author: MATHEW GOEBEL

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised and I mostly happy with it . About the only negative thing I can say to it is it’s kind of feels cheaply made but I don’t know if an upgrade in tolerances and material Would be worth the price to the end user .
customer_reviews.author: hissatsu5

customer_reviews.title: This is a great idea.
customer_reviews.text: I really dig this little unit. So easy to throw in a bag, and performs well. No wasted sheets with the retraction feature.
customer_reviews.author: WilliamInNashville

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for on the go!
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for the on the go use. I can keep it in my car or store it in my purse. The roller works well. Overall a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kyra ross

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Fun! Based off Tesla technology. Lights candles so far. Haven't gotten to test much else. It works great and is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Clevenger

customer_reviews.title: Very Stylish and Practical
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Very stylish, portable and works well. I found watching a YouTuber. Good price too!
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great! sheets are very sticky and work well. I keep this in my bag for on-the-go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but a little bit expensive
customer_reviews.text: I like how it looks only thing i dislike is how expensive it is compared to a normal one from scotch brite. This one seems convenient to keep in the car just in case
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Wife had one that she keeps in her purse, ...
customer_reviews.text: Wife had one that she keeps in her purse, I decided to get one for the car as well. These are so handy.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Bieger

customer_reviews.title: An essential item for pet owners on the go!
customer_reviews.text: I love how compact the roller is and the built in cover. I pop it in my purse and go.
customer_reviews.author: L. Scalmanini

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great design, small and portable! And love it’s refillable feature!
customer_reviews.author: Breanna N

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great compact size. Easy to pack for travel. The retracting function keeps the roller clean when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Cirincione

customer_reviews.title: but it does a good job on removing lint
customer_reviews.text: I already wrote a comment on these. Lint filters were suggested by a vet to roll over your pet when they first come in from being outdoors. So I thought I'd try it. Not so hot for that purpose, but it does a good job on removing lint!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Swiney

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling and the car because of the size ...
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs that shed, so I need a lint roller at the house, vehicle, work, travel. Great for traveling and the car because of the size and design. One sheet does one shirt. A pair of pants needs two in most cases. For travel, this is 4 stars. I would not use around the house because it is too small.
customer_reviews.author: APorter

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Stylish, Effective
customer_reviews.text: We have a fluffy cat and shedding dog at home, so we keep these in our vehicles and travel bags for the last touch up when you are on the go. I love that they have a stylish compact design and come in different color combos. They have the right amount of sticky, so they pack a big punch even though they are small. You don’t have to change the sheet every time you use it, because it slides back in protecting the “sticky.” I don’t find that I have to change the roll often even though I use it almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: blissfulfour

customer_reviews.title: Metallic slate gray goodness
customer_reviews.text: So much goodness in a lint roller! So I just got mine today, but I've been using one from a friend for some time now. Super easy to use, looks great, easy to tuck into almost anything, and it's durable. Not sure why people are complaining about only 30 sheets. Since it's retractable, you are not ruining the first one each time you need to use it. We've had the larger roll type previously with our two white long hair cats, but every time you need to use the roller the outer sheet is a throwaway. Plus the refills are inexpensive and also available on Amazon. Great product, love the design and will be getting more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Warfield Jr.

customer_reviews.title: These lint rollers rock!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these wonderful lint rollers over a year ago. Love it so much, I just purchased 2 more - one for my husband to keep at work, and one for myself, to keep in my car. These are fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi T.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a glove box
customer_reviews.text: Most of the time I forget that I own this until I actually need it. I have pets, dark clothing and cloth seats in my car and none of that works well together but this little guy fixes that.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Genius product
customer_reviews.text: Super handy, very sticky so it gets all the lint and stubborn pet hair and I love the case. Small enough to carry in a purse.
customer_reviews.author: D. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little product
customer_reviews.text: I cant imagine a better design for a flint roller.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: Pretty neat ... does the trick and doesn’t take up a lot of space
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... a little flimsy then what I thought but overall happy.
customer_reviews.text: The twist part is a little flimsy then what I thought but overall happy.
customer_reviews.author: Catie

customer_reviews.title: Bought one and could not figure out how to open ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought one and could not figure out how to open it & soon discovered it was broken. I returned it for a new one and the new one twist up the way it's supposed to. Going to be a stocking stuffer.
customer_reviews.author: SBaddison8

customer_reviews.title: I like that it fits in my purse but could be ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay, I like that it fits in my purse but could be stickier.
customer_reviews.author: Brienna

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a giveaway at an event and ended up buying one for my mom and sisters for Christmas last year. I love this! I keep it in my desk at work and don't have to worry about it getting stuck on stuff. The only reason I gave 4 stars is because the sheets at the end don't get smaller and you end up losing a good amount of sticky paper. I cut the sheets so I'm using every last bit.
customer_reviews.author: Skylar

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, meh
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to like these, but ultimately it's kind of crappy. Sticky sheets were tough to peel, case broke.
customer_reviews.author: Pushie

customer_reviews.title: I really like the idea behind this
customer_reviews.text: I really like the idea behind this, and it works ok, but I ordered the blue one SPECIFICALLY for the nice design and the one I received looks nothing like it. It's a pale blue badly wrapped image that stretches in an ugly way and looks cheap. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Franz

customer_reviews.title: Great product, I carry one in my purse and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I carry one in my purse and can’t tell you how many times this has come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisette Hantke

product_meta.title: Flint Retractable Lint Roller, Refillable, 30 Sheets, Metallic Slate Gray
